Package helio.framework.materialiser

Interface MaterialiserEngine

public interface MaterialiserEngine
MaterialiserEngine is meant to translate the data from a set of data sources into RDF, providing access to generated resources, or allowing to perform SPARQL queries.

In addition to deal with large RDF data sets, the MaterialiserEngine provides InputStream for consuming the query answer

Author:
Andrea Cimmino

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void close()
    This method closes all the background processes of Helio, for instance, the processes that generate the RDF of asynchronous DataSource
    org.eclipse.rdf4j.model.Model getRDF()
    This method returns all the triples of the last updated RDF
    org.eclipse.rdf4j.model.Model getResource​(String iri)
    This method returns all the triples of the last updated RDF which subject is the one provided
    String query​(String sparqlQuery, SparqlResultsFormat format)
    This method solves the provided SPARQL over the last updated RDF
    InputStream queryStream​(String sparqlQuery, SparqlResultsFormat format)
    This method solves the provided SPARQL over the last updated RDF
    void updateSynchronousSources()
    This method updates the RDF of all the synchronous DataSource, if the internal cache is an external triple store the updated triples will be injected in such store

  • Method Details

    • getResource

      org.eclipse.rdf4j.model.Model getResource​(String iri) throws ResourceNotFoundException
      This method returns all the triples of the last updated RDF which subject is the one provided
      Parameters:
      iri - an IRI that identifies a specific resource, i.e., the subject
      Returns:
      a Model containing the relevant triples
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - is thrown when the requested IRI was not found

    • getRDF

      org.eclipse.rdf4j.model.Model getRDF()
      This method returns all the triples of the last updated RDF
      Returns:
      a Model containing the relevant triples

    • query

      String query​(String sparqlQuery, SparqlResultsFormat format)
      This method solves the provided SPARQL over the last updated RDF
      Parameters:
      sparqlQuery - a valid SPARQL query (SELECT, ASK, DESCRIBE, or CONSTRUCT)
      format - specifies a SparqlResultsFormat format in which the query answer will be expressed
      Returns:
      a String containing the query answers

    • queryStream

      InputStream queryStream​(String sparqlQuery, SparqlResultsFormat format)
      This method solves the provided SPARQL over the last updated RDF
      Parameters:
      sparqlQuery - a valid SPARQL query (SELECT, ASK, DESCRIBE, or CONSTRUCT)
      format - specifies a SparqlResultsFormat format in which the query answer will be expressed
      Returns:
      a InputStream containing the query answers

    • updateSynchronousSources

      void updateSynchronousSources()
      This method updates the RDF of all the synchronous DataSource, if the internal cache is an external triple store the updated triples will be injected in such store

    • close

      void close()
      This method closes all the background processes of Helio, for instance, the processes that generate the RDF of asynchronous DataSource
